src:
Zinedine Zidane Merasa Dikhianati Gareth Bale, Masalah Apa?
01 Nov 2019, 11:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Zinedine Zidane adalah pria sopan yang tidak sering mengutarakan isi hatinya dengan gamblang. Namun, saat ini, tampaknya pelatih Real Madrid ini merasa dikhianati oleh Gareth Bale.
Bukan karena cedera betis Bale yang memaksanya absen sejak jeda internasional terakhir, bukan karena keputusan Bale meninggalkan skuad untuk terbang ke London dan menemui ahli medis, Zidane terganggu masalah lain.
Kemarahan Zidane sudah mendahului kasus cedera Bale itu. Justru, Zidane kesal dengan komentar Bale saat membela Timnas Wales pada Oktober lalu.
Mengapa demikian? Dilansir dari Sport, baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Zinedine Zidane Feeling Betrayed by Gareth Bale, What Problem?
Nov 1 2019, 11:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Zinedine Zidane is a polite man who does not often express his heart's content clearly. However, at the moment, it seems that the Real Madrid coach feels betrayed by Gareth Bale.
Not because of Bale's calf injury that forced him to be absent since the last international break, not because of Bale's decision to leave the squad to fly to London and meet with medical experts, Zidane disturbed other problems.
Zidane's anger has preceded the Bale injury case. Instead, Zidane was upset with Bale's comments when defending the Wales national team last October.
Why is that? Reporting from Sport, read below, yeah, Bolaneters!
